00024 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Configuration implements ArrayAccess {
00025 
00031         const PACKAGE_KEY = 'MailformPlusPlus';
00032 
00039         protected $setup;
00040 
00047         public function __construct() {
00048                 $this->setup = $GLOBALS['TSFE']->tmpl->setup['plugin.'][$this->getPrefixedPackageKey() . '.'];
00049         }
00050 
00058         public function merge($setup) {
00059                 if (isset($setup) && is_array($setup)) {
00060                         $settings = $this->setup['settings.'];
00061                         $settings = t3lib_div::array_merge_recursive_overrule($settings, $setup);
00062                         $this->setup['settings.'] = $settings;
00063                 }
00064         }
00065 
00066         public function offsetGet($offset) {
00067                 return $this->setup['settings.'][$offset];
00068         }
00069 
00070         public function offsetSet($offset, $value) {
00071                 $this->setup['settings.'][$offset] = $value;
00072         }
00073 
00074         public function offsetExists($offset) {
00075                 if (isset($this->setup['settings.'][$offset])) {
00076                         return TRUE;
00077                 } else {
00078                         return FALSE;
00079                 }
00080         }
00081 
00082         public function offsetUnset($offset) {
00083                 $this->setup['settings.'][$offset] = NULL;
00084         }
00085 
00092         public function getSettings() {
00093                 return $this->setup['settings.'];
00094         }
00095 
00102         public function getSourcesConfiguration() {
00103                 return $this->setup['sources.'];
00104         }
00105 
00112         public function getPackageKey() {
00113                 return self::PACKAGE_KEY;
00114         }
00115 
00122         public function getPackageKeyLowercase() {
00123                 return strtolower(self::PACKAGE_KEY);
00124         }
00125 
00132         public function getPrefixedPackageKey() {
00133                 return F3_GimmeFive_Component_Manager::PACKAGE_PREFIX . '_' . self::PACKAGE_KEY;

00135
